column5: Looks like i'm heading to charlottetown for afew days in june and was hoping to do some saltwater fishing from shore. I've looked online but have found only info on trout, salmon and offshore fishing. Would like to do some shore fishing if possible and any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks jeff
Figure out when the shad or stripers are running.
Is this what you called me about today. Call me tonight ill giveyousome info.
